amendment.description: An amendment numbered 72 printed in House Report 115-297 to restrict federal agencies from using funds to pay legal fees under any lawsuit settlement regarding a case that arises under the Clean Air Act, the Clean Water Act, and the Endangered Species Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A095) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A095) offered by Mr. Smith (MO).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A095) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
